Performance:
December 2000: The Vow of Rokusuke

Production: December 2000

Play: The Vow of Rokusuke (彦山権現誓助剣)

Scenes:

Suma Beach (須磨の浦 / Suma no ura)

The Gourd Trellis (瓢箪棚 / Hyōtan dana)

The Sugisaka Cemetery (杉坂墓所 / Sugisaka bosho)

Rokusuke's House (毛谷村六助住家 / Keyamura Rokusuke sumika)

Characters:

Yasaburo (Kinugawa Yasaburō / 衣川弥三郎)

Okiku (Koshimoto Okiku / 腰元お菊)

Mayumi (Okugata Mayumi no Kata / 奥方真弓の方)

Rindayu, a Shinto priest (Hafuribe Yamagami Rindayū / 祝部山上倫太夫)

Mokusokan, in fact Shihoden (Shakishōgun Mokusokan / 車騎将軍木曾官実は四方田但馬守)

Rokusuke (Keyamura Rokusuke / 毛谷村六助)

Enami, a warrior (Enami Ikkaku / 榎並一学)

Hayakawa, a warrior (Hayakawa Tomō / 早川兎毛)

Dengoemon (Todoroki Dengoemon / 轟伝五右衛門)

Ichimisai (Yoshioka Ichimisai / 吉岡一味斎)

Yasamatsu (Isshi Yasomatsu (Yasamatsu) / 一子弥三松)

Tomohei (Wakatō Tomohei / 若党友平)

Yasazaemon (Kinugawa Yasozaemon (Yasazaemon) / 衣川弥三左衛門)

Takumi (Kyōgoku Takumi / 京極内匠)

Tozo (Harukaze Tōzō / 春風藤蔵)

Otonari (Kōritaishu Otonari / 郡大守音成)

Hisayoshi (Mashiba Hisayoshi / 真柴久吉)

Shingo Sakurai (Sakurai Shingo / 桜井新吾)

Sasen (Isha [Shiba] Sasen / 医者柴左仙)

Kotomi, a lady-in-waiting (Koshimoto Kotomi / 腰元小富)

Omatsu, a lady-in-waiting (Koshimoto Omatsu / 腰元お松)

Sannojo (Otōto Sannojō / 弟三之丞)

Oko (Haha Okō / 母お幸)

Osono (Musume Osono / 娘お園)

Sagohei (Wakatō Sagohei / 若党佐吾平)

Page (Koshō / 小姓)

Low class samurai (Aozamurai / 青侍)

Kojika, a street girl (Sōka Kojika (Oshika) / 惣嫁小鹿(辻君お鹿))

Onoemon's mother (Onoemon no haha / 斧右衛門の母)

Gihei Kadowaki, a highway robber (Kadowaki Gihei / 門脇儀平)

Osen, a street girl (Sōka Osen / 惣嫁(辻君)お仙)

Kikuno, a street girl (Sōka Kikuno / 惣嫁(辻君)菊野)

Itachigawa, a sumo werestler (Itachigawa / いたち川)

Pack-horse leader (Batei / 馬丁)

Matsubei, a woodcutter (Soma Matsubei / 杣松兵衛)

Makizo, a woodcutter (Soma Makizō / 杣槙蔵)

Kashiroku, a woodcutter (Soma Kashiroku / 杣樫六)

Highway robber (Sanzoku / 山賊)

Soheiji, a retainer of Takumi (Horiguchi Soheiji / 堀口曾平次)

Onoemon (Soma Onoemon / 杣斧右衛門)

Gunpachi, a retainer of Takumi (Ōtsubo Gunpachi / 大坪軍八)

Ladies-in-waiting (Koshimoto / 腰元)

Kuriemon (Soma Kuriemon / 杣栗右衛門)

Samurai (Kinju / 近習)

Assistant priests (Gekan / 下官)

Carpenters (Daiku / 大工)

Servants (Yakko / 奴)

Servants (Kumiko / 組子)
